Himmeriget Review | Bon Appetit









































Close Menu IconLoginRecipesCookingCultureShoppingRestaurantsBA MarketVideosPodcastSubscribe to our newsletterSign UpPrivacy and user agreementMain Navigation IconBA LogoBon appetitLogincopenhagenHimmeriget10 beer taps, lots of Fernet, and cocktails that’ll make everyone happy at this Frederiksberg barFacebookPinterestTwitterEmailPhoto by Ditte IsagerGO HERE: to go deep on beer. The minimalist neighborhood space has an 11-page bottle list to round out the 10 taps. Not a beer person? There are cocktails, American whiskies, eight kinds of Fernet, etc.ORDER THE: any of the beer on tap! As for the cocktails, the Carola is a favorite: bourbon, Gran Classico, lime crush, and India pale ale.THE VIBE IS: graphic designer-y but approachable. Let’s just say this is the kind of place that sells bottles of Underberg behind the bar—and not just for the so-so takeaway pizzas you can order from next door.PRACTICAL STUFF: Open every day: Sunday and Monday from 3 p.m. to midnight; Tuesday to Thursday from 3 p.m. to 2 a.m.; and Friday and Saturday from 2 p.m. to 3 a.m.—Christine MuhlkePhoto by Ditte IsagerPhoto by Ditte IsagerWE ALSO LOVEBRUSHydrate, sort of, with 33 constantly changing taps from this Nørrebro suds stopDuck and CoverA *Mad Men*-esque temple to mixology in Vesterbro.VinskabetIndulge your inner wine geek at this breezy Nørrebro bar.Explore City GuidesAtlantaAustinBostonCharlestonChicagoCopenhagenLas VegasLondonLos AngelesMexico CityMiamiMontrealNew OrleansNew YorkParisPhiladelphiaPortlandSan FranciscoSeattleTokyoTorontoVancouverWashington, D.C.GET THE MAGAZINEBA LogoBon appetitSUBSCRIBESign up for Updates on the Bon AppétitCity GuidesSign UpWill be used in accordance with our user agreement and privacy policyBA LogoBon appetitSubscription FAQsMastheadNewsletter SignupAccessibility HelpRSS FeedsSite MapCondé Nast StoreCareersBon Appétit Media KitDo Not Sell My Personal InformationCondé NastFood Innovation Group: Bon Appétit and Epicurious© 2022 Condé Nast.
